body.p: Clark County, Indiana, prisoner. Native of Germany. Convicted of grand larceny in Dearborn County, Indiana, on September 10, 1859. Prisoner of Indiana State Prison South in Jeffersonville, Indiana, from 1859 to October 10, 1864. Fugitive from justice from the state of Indiana from July 29, 1860, to September 22, 1863.
